title: Forever Heroes
description: 10 of today's best selling authors bring you 10 full length novels of Courage, Sacrifice, and Love.Broken Wings by Erika AshbyShattered and Shaken by Julie BailesLetters Home by Rebecca BrookeTempt My Heart by Danielle JamieWhat If by Bayli LaneCrashing Back Down by Kristen Hope MazzolaFighting Redemption by Kate McCartyComing Back to You by Renea PorterCrazy Good by Rachel RobinsonIgnite by Tessa Teevan
author: Erika Ashby
